name: Carcavas
description:
The Carcavas valley comprises over fifty thousand acres of eroded hills and mixed grassland in north west █r█e█d█a█c█t█e█d█.  A lost frontier of hidden promises for those that dare crisscross its dry steppes...

Made in 48+-  hours for PS1Jam, so expect some bugs and performance thingies :) You prob need a dedicated gpu, mouse and keyboard, wasd to move, esc for menu.

-

If you'd like to talk with others about the experience, you're welcome to at the colorfiction discord.
